Reviews.Title: Pantech Crossover
Reviews.Author: Thaddeust2
Reviews.Content: The phone is what I thought it was.  Being not so tech savvy this is a great beginner's smartphone.  The phone does everything I need and more.  The screen is a little sensitive but not annoying.  The slide keyboard is great, the screen size is small but that's what I like about the phone its size.  The feel of the phone in the hand is good. The phone has been dropped with no internal or external damage.

Reviews.Title: Smart buy
Reviews.Author: DJ Tater
Reviews.Content: Smart buy, is an old enough phone that I didn't have to pay the extra smart phone fee, but it works just fine for me since i don't require a high dollar name brand. let's me play my few games and texts just fine. Locks up once in a while , but for what I paid for it, more than pleased.

Reviews.Title: water damage
Reviews.Author: bob
Reviews.Content: When I got the phone it had water damage on it. Up intill last month it was working fine and it started to act up so I took it to at&t; and they said it had water damage and i thought that the sticker that measures water damage was supose to be red and I didnt know that the red means water damage.

Reviews.Title: Just what he needed
Reviews.Author: 5frys
Reviews.Content: The husband is not fond of touch screen, so this was a good phone for him.  it is a little bit thick, but it is because it is a slide out.  IT is a fast phone and works on android system.  So far it has been great and meets all his needs!
